title: fanoutqa: How many employees did the Big Tech company with the most employees have in 2022? (0c7d2dcf79960ee6)

chat_history.content: How many employees did the Big Tech company with the most employees have in 2022?

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions":"Find out which Big Tech company had the most employees in 2022 and how many employees it had."}

chat_history.content: In 2022, the Big Tech company with the most employees was Amazon.com, Inc., with 1.5 million employees.

chat_history.content: In 2022, Amazon had the most employees among Big Tech companies, with a total of 1.5 million employees.

## Largest private and semiprivate employers[edit]


The rankings below are the six private-sector and semiprivate companies providing the most jobs worldwide, according to a list published in 2021 by *Fortune* magazine.[5] The Tata Group of companies, which collectively employ over 720,000 people,[6] is not listed by *Fortune* as a single enterprise.[5]





| Rank
 | Employer
 | Country
 | Employees
 | State-owned
 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1
 | China National Petroleum | ![](image) China | 1,242,245
 | ![Yes](image) |
| 2
 | Tata Group | ![](image) India | 935,000
 | ![No](image) |
| 3
 | China Post Group | ![](image) China | 927,171
 | ![Yes](image) |
| 4
 | State Grid | ![](image) China | 896,360
 | ![Yes](image) |
| 5
 | Accenture | ![](image) Ireland | 738,000
 | ![No](image) |
| 6
 | United States Postal Service | ![](image) United States | 569,987
 | ![Yes](image) |
| 7
 | Sinopec Group | ![](image) China | 553,833
 | ![Yes](image) |
